title: Hungarian hardcore: sex, lies and no videotape
summary_full: As Viktor Orbán faces his stiffest electoral test in more than a decade, a phantom sex tape, AI-fuelled propaganda and escalating smear tactics have thrust Hungary’s campaign into a surreal showdown where insinuation may matter more than evidence
